document_data.mainbody:
Malkax and Geltik were hobgoblin brigands, led by Zargal in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Malkax was dressed in a set of leather armor, a horned helmet, armed with a bastard sword, and a composite longbow.
As of 1368 DR, Zargal, accompanied by Malkax and Geltik, were ambushing travelers in the Red Canyons of the Sword Coast. The hobgoblins demanded all valuables to be handed over in exchange for the travelers lives. If refused, Zargal attacked, while claiming to the the "strongest there is."
